verses.verse: May God <WH430> be merciful <WH2603> to us, <WH1288> bless us, <WH6440> and cause his face to shine <WH215> on us. <WH5542> Selah.
That your way <WH1870> may be known <WH3045> on earth, <WH776> and your salvation <WH3444> among all nations, <WH1471>
let the peoples <WH5971> praise <WH3034> you, <WH430> God. Let all the peoples <WH5971> praise you. <WH3034>

Oh let the nations <WH3816> be glad <WH8055> and sing for joy, <WH7442> for you will judge <WH8199> the peoples <WH5971> with equity, <WH4334> and govern <WH5148> the nations <WH3816> on earth. <WH776> Selah. <WH5542>
Let the peoples <WH5971> praise <WH3034> you, <WH430> God. Let all the peoples <WH5971> praise you. <WH3034>
The earth <WH776> has yielded <WH5414> its increase. <WH2981> God, <WH430> even our own God, <WH430> will bless us. <WH1288>
God <WH430> will bless <WH1288> us. <WH657> All the ends of the earth <WH776> shall fear him. <WH3372>
